subject: Re: Donate button website not working
preview: Hi all  The donate button is now working.  The problem was with PayPal and not our website.  Recently a new donor made a $1 donation. This is generally a sign that someone is trying to hack into a web

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi all

The donate button is now working.

The problem was with PayPal and not our website.

Recently a new donor made a $1 donation. This is generally a sign that someone is trying to hack into a website. I'm therefore assuming PayPal temporarily shut our site down because of that. I will check with PayPal as to why they shut our platform down plus request they contact us next time they need to take this sort of protective measure. I checked my Junk and Deleted emails but there was no advice from PayPalthey notifying they would be doing this.

Thanks all.

Kind regards

MARTINA FOX​

COMMUNITY RELATIONS MANAGER

235 Morrison Rd

Ryde

NSW

2112

+61 2 9808 9377

E.

Martina.Fox@royalrehab.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:

Hi Trudy,

To help you correct this, please provide us the Paypal link so we can update it.

@heath   getting an error when going to the Paypal link saying "This recipient is currently unable to receive money.". I believed there's something wrong with the link. Can we ask the client to send the Paypal link to us?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
